Description: Papyrus fragment bearing 4 lines of Coptic epistolary text written against the fibres (verso).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381267) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381267)
Ede 1972- / Writing and lettering in antiquity (1992, no. 40a)
